title: Apple Media Services Terms and Conditions
Purpose: This section introduces the terms and conditions governing the use of Apple Media Services.

title: INTRODUCTION TO OUR SERVICES

title: USING OUR SERVICES
Purpose: This section discusses the acquisition of content through Apple’s services and the nature of transactions.

title: PAYMENTS, TAXES AND REFUNDS
Purpose: This section outlines the payment process, including payment methods and transaction handling.
This section specifies the process for charging payment methods and handling payment issues.
This section explains the handling of payment methods, charges, and the implications of failed transactions.
This section addresses the terms for payment method backups, pre-orders, and consequences of payment failures.

title: Right of cancellation
Purpose: This section explains the user's right to cancel their order within a specified period.

Purpose: This section details the process for notifying the provider about order cancellation.

Purpose: This section defines the deadline for communicating a cancellation.

title: Effects of cancellation
Purpose: This section outlines the reimbursement process after cancellation.

title: Exception to the right of cancellation
Purpose: This section describes circumstances under which cancellation is not allowed.

title: Model cancellation form
Purpose: This section provides a template for users to use when notifying their cancellation.

title: ACCOUNT
Purpose: This section discusses the requirements and responsibilities associated with maintaining an Apple ID.

Purpose: This section sets the minimum age for creating an Apple ID and using the services.

title: Legacy Contact

title: Limitation of Liability
Purpose: This section outlines the limitations on Licensor's liability for damages and losses related to the use of External Services and Licensed Applications.

title: (i)
Purpose: This subsection specifies situations where Licensor is not liable for losses or damages caused by its actions or inactions.
This clause states that Licensor is not liable if there was no breach of duty owed to the user.
This clause clarifies that Licensor is not liable for unforeseeable results from any breach.
This clause indicates liability is not applicable if any increase in loss is due to the user's breach of the Agreement.
This clause specifies that Licensor is not liable for actions taken related to suspected violations of the Agreement.
This clause states that Licensor is not liable for loss of income or data corruption related to the use of the Licensed Application.

title: (ii)
Purpose: This subsection affirms that nothing in the Agreement limits Licensor’s liability for fraud or negligence.

title: You may not use or otherwise export or re-export the Licensed Application
Purpose: This section restricts the use and export of the Licensed Application in compliance with U.S. laws.

title: U S  Government End Users
Purpose: This section delineates the licensing terms for U.S. government end users regarding the Licensed Application.

title: Except to the extent expressly provided in the following paragraph
Purpose: This section states that the Agreement is governed by California law and outlines the jurisdiction for disputes.

title: DEFINITION OF APPLE

title: Depending on your Home Country, 'Apple' means:
Purpose: This section explains the different legal entities that represent Apple based on the user's home country.

title: Apple Inc , located at One Apple Park Way, Cupertino, California, for users in the United States, including Puerto Rico;
Purpose: This line specifies the address and entity for U.S. users.

title: Apple Canada Inc , located at 120 Bremner Blvd , Suite 1600, Toronto ON M5J 0A8, Canada for users in Canada;
Purpose: This line specifies the address and entity for Canadian users.

title: Apple Services LATAM LLC, located at 1 Alhambra Plaza, Ste 700 Coral Gables, Florida, for users in Mexico, Central or South America, or any Caribbean country or territory (excluding Puerto Rico);
Purpose: This line specifies the address and entity for users in Latin America.

title: iTunes K K , located at Roppongi Hills, 6-10-1 Roppongi, Minato-ku, Tokyo 106-6140, Tokyo for users in Japan;
Purpose: This line specifies the address and entity for users in Japan.

title: Apple Pty Limited, located at Level 3, 20 Martin Place, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia, for users in Australia or New Zealand, including in any of their territories or affiliated jurisdictions; and
Purpose: This line specifies the address and entity for users in Australia and New Zealand.

title: Apple Distribution International Ltd , located at Hollyhill Industrial Estate, Hollyhill, Cork, Republic of Ireland for all other users
